title: The alpha client chat positioning is not convenient at all.
body:
The title speaks for itself, I think they updated a feature that didn't need to be updated/changed, having the chat logs with all your friends along the bottom of the screen was much more easier, convenient and just plain better. The way the alpha client has set the chat message system up is just awkward, the chats are in random order and not in order of most recently talked to or even alphabetical which also annoys me greatly. I appreciate the time they've put into trying to improve the client, and don't get me wrong; I can adjust with time to the rest of the updated client but the chat system just puts me off from chatting with friends on league.
 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Personally, I prefer it in it's new set-up and, as far as I can tell, it actually does order them in "most recent" format. Perhaps it's just not always working as intended yet, after all the client has only just gone into Beta. There's bound to be a deal more issues to sort out.

Honestly, I feel it would be a much better move on Riot's part if there was an option to alternate between the "legacy" chat layout and the "updated" chat layout. I honestly feel that a lot of "legacy vs updated" layout options would go a long way to not only pleasing the community but also allowing for a smoother transition, since people will be able to make the change at a pace more suited to them.

That's a great suggestion, thanks for the input! if riot could honestly add an option to switch around the layout with the chat system just like the in-game champion icons following the updated HUD. I think it'd be highly beneficial for players who have a preference with the two different chat layouts.

What i Love the new chat!
the way it confuses me, the way its in the way its just rushed...
I don't mind new layout cause they basically just copied DOTA's layout. But I can see why some people might not like it
Idm the new Chat for the Alpha client, but if there could be like a little Icon that minimises it to the side instead of the bottom, that be cool. Would this be a Yes or No?

That'd be a much better idea, I just hate the way it's set out at the moment, it's quite messy and not crisp/clean, like the alpha client is supposed to be, however that may be a good way to improve it from it's current state.
Sorry guys, phrased the poll question incorrectly; meant to be "Do you think that the chat system for the old cilent should **be** in the same layout as the new client?"
